column4: Can someone help me? Got a ssh-rsa key that I need to ssh to another shell. How do I get this to work?/where do I put the key?
when you create an rsa key you create the private and public key
you store the private key in ~/.ssh/id_rsa (by default) and you store the .pub key at the destination in ~/.authorized_keys
what should I name the file with the key inside that folder then?
